CustomField.description: This field will check whether, QA Check List is internal or Clients, based on the Name of QA Checklist
CustomField.formula: IF(CONTAINS(QA_Checklist__r.Name, 'Social'), 'For Internal QAs', IF(CONTAINS(QA_Checklist__r.Name, 'Client'), 'For Client QAs', ''))
CustomField.label: Internal Or Client QA
